div.p: We thank the Kia House of Chiefs, the Isabel Provincial Government, the Solomon Islands Ministry of Fisheries and Marine Resources and the Solomon Islands Ministry of Environment, Climate Change, Disaster Management and Meteorology for supporting this work. We thank W. Dolava, M. Giningele, P. Kame, C. Gereniu, W. Enota, P. Jay, F. Kavali, T. Leve, P. Lomae, L. Madada, D. Motui, J. Pai, G. Tavake, J. Ulo, and R. Zama for partaking in the UVC survey. The 2012 underwater surveys were completed with support from The Asian Development Bank (ADB TA‚Äê7753). We would also like to acknowledge the Queensland University of Technology and its Vacation Research Experience Scheme for providing a scholarship to A.R.P to complete this study.
